data.name: Metapod

abilities.name: Adaptive Evolution
abilities.text: This Pokémon can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to this Pokémon if that damage is 60 or less.

data.flavorText: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

data.name: Metapod

attacks.name: Iron Defense
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: Its shell is filled with its soft innards. It doesn't move much because of the risk it might carelessly spill its innards out.

data.name: Metapod
data.flavorText: Its shell is filled with a thick liquid. All of the cells throughout its body are being rebuilt in preparation for evolution.

data.name: Metapod
data.flavorText: Its shell is filled with its soft innards. It doesn't move much because of the risk it might carelessly spill its innards out.

data.name: Metapod

abilities.name: Adaptive Evolution
abilities.text: This Pokémon can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.

data.flavorText: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.

data.name: Metapod

abilities.name: Emerge
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon and put it onto this Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.flavorText: Its shell is filled with a thick liquid. All of the cells throughout its body are being rebuilt in preparation for evolution.

data.name: Metapod

attacks.name: Stiffen
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It can't withstand a harsh attack.

data.name: Metapod

abilities.name: Adaptive Evolution
abilities.text: This Pokémon can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to this Pokémon if that damage is 60 or less.

data.flavorText: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

data.name: Metapod

abilities.name: Green Shield
abilities.text: Each of your Grass Pokémon has no Weakness.

data.flavorText: It prepares for evolution by hardening its shell as much as possible to protect its soft body.

abilities.name: Energy Protection
abilities.text: Any damage done to Metapod by attacks is reduced by 10 for each Energy attached to Metapod. You can't reduce more than 30 damage in this way.

data.name: Metapod

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, whenever 20 or less damage is done to Metapod (after applying Weakness and Resistance), prevent that damage. (Any other effects of attacks still happen).

attacks.name: Hatch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, remove all damage counters from Metapod. Then, search your deck for a card that evolves from Metapod and attach that card to Metapod. This counts as evolving Metapod. Shuffle your deck afterward.

data.flavorText: Inside the shell, it is soft and weak as it prepares to evolve. It stays motionless in the shell.

data.name: Metapod

abilities.name: Emerge
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Metapod is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card that evolves from Metapod and put it onto Metapod. (This counts as evolving Metapod.) Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Metapod is affected by a Special Condition.

data.flavorText: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

data.name: Metapod

attacks.name: Stiffen
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Metapod during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: It is vulnerable to attack because its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

abilities.name: Exoskeleton
abilities.text: All damage done by attacks to Metapod is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.name: Metapod

abilities.name: Exoskeleton
abilities.text: This Pokémon takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It can't withstand a harsh attack.
